argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | irredn0.i | |- I = ( Irred ` R ) |
| 2 |  | irredneg.n | |- N = ( invg ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` R ) = ( .r ` R ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. I ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 7 | 1, 3 | #P_irredcl | |- ( X e. I -> X e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. I ) -> X e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 4, 5, 2, 6, 8 | #P_rngnegr | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. I ) -> ( X ( .r ` R ) ( N ` ( 1r ` R ) ) ) = ( N ` X ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` R ) = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 11 | 10, 5 | #P_1unit | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( 1r ` R ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 2 | #P_unitnegcl | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( 1r ` R ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) -> ( N ` ( 1r ` R ) ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_mpdan | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( N ` ( 1r ` R ) ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. I ) -> ( N ` ( 1r ` R ) ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 10, 4 | #P_irredrmul | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. I /\ ( N ` ( 1r ` R ) ) e. ( Unit ` R ) ) -> ( X ( .r ` R ) ( N ` ( 1r ` R ) ) ) e. I ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. I ) -> ( X ( .r ` R ) ( N ` ( 1r ` R ) ) ) e. I ) |
| 17 | 9, 16 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. I ) -> ( N ` X ) e. I ) |
